PROCESS BEFORE OUTPUT.																																
 MODULE STATUS_0100.																																
MODULE clear_ok_code.																																
MODULE move_to_dynp.																																
MODULE FILL_DYNNR.																																
																																
  CALL SUBSCREEN SUB1 INCLUDING SY-CPROG DYNNR.																																
																																
  CALL SUBSCREEN SUB2 INCLUDING SY-CPROG DYNNR1.																																
																																
																																
																																
PROCESS AFTER INPUT.																																
																																
																																
 MODULE USER_COMMAND_0100.																																
																																
    CALL SUBSCREEN SUB1.																																
    CALL SUBSCREEN SUB2.																																
																																
 MODULE CHECK_FLIGHT .																																
 MODULE get_seat.
